definition: mountain pass/to close/to shut/to turn off/to concern/to involve
festival/holiday/node/joint/section/segment/part/to economize/to save/to abridge/moral integrity/classifier for segments, e.g. lessons, train wagons, biblical verses/CL:個|个[ge4]
see 節骨眼|节骨眼[jie1 gu5 yan3]
articular capsule (of joint such as knee in anatomy)
to solicit a bribe/to accept a bribe
to facilitate by means of bribery

pinyin: feng1 shi1 xing4 guan1 jie2 yan2

sentences.english: He’d fractured his rib and hip.
sentences.chinese: 他折斷了胸骨和髖關節。

sentences.english: Methods To review the operative treatment of various kinds of fracture and luxation of anklebone in 60 cases.
sentences.chinese: 方法回顧60例各種踝關節骨折及脫位的手術治療。
桂皮可以減輕關節疼痛。

sentences.english: The discomfort subsides gradually over one or two weeks, leaving the joint apparently normal, and pain-free.
sentences.chinese: 不適感會在一到兩週內逐漸減弱，直到關節恢復正常。

sentences.english: Conclusion It is useful for some kinetic parameters in gait of patella-femoral joint to be computed based on this model.
sentences.chinese: 結論該模型可以有效的計算髕股關節動力學參數。

sentences.english: Conclusion Moxibustion therapy is an effective method for acute gouty arthritis.
sentences.chinese: 結論中醫灸法治療痛風性關節炎急性期療效確切。

sentences.english: Lie face down on the floor with your elbows bent and your palms next to your shoulders.
sentences.chinese: 臉朝地板向下，肘關節彎曲，手心靠近肩膀。

sentences.english: Objective To improve the understanding and diagnosis of primary hypertrophic osteoarthropathy(PHO).
sentences.chinese: 目的提高對原發性肥大性骨關節病的認識和診斷。

sentences.english: Postoperative septic arthritis is an uncommon complication after anterior cruciate ligament reconstruction.
sentences.chinese: 前叉重建後感染性關節炎是一種罕見的併發症。

sentences.english: This is the phenomenon of so-called "function compensation"of muscle in hip joint.
sentences.chinese: 即，髖關節肌有所謂“功能補償”的現象。

sentences.english: And the dangerous offense is a type of criminal attempt.
sentences.chinese: 着手實行是犯罪預備與犯罪未遂的關節點。

sentences.english: Disabling, refractory knee pain that meets both of the following criteria.
sentences.chinese: 禁用，難治性膝關節疼痛，符合以下兩個條件。

sentences.english: and the ground is really soft, so that you don't end up hurting your joints.
sentences.chinese: 土地也很柔軟，這樣你的關節就不會受傷了。

sentences.english: Every joint is drived by stepping motor .
sentences.chinese: 機器人的各個關節由步進電機作爲驅動源。

sentences.english: Healing the sacroiliac joint takes constant vigilance.
sentences.chinese: 骶髂關節的治療需要時刻保持警惕。

definition: cervical vertebra/the seven cervical vertebrae in the neck of humans and most mammals
deformation/to become deformed/to change shape/to morph
qi and blood (two basic bodily fluids of Chinese medicine)
to stretch taut/(of muscles etc) taut/strained/tense
to pull back/to shrink/to contract/(physiology) systole
knee/(Internet slang) to kneel down (in admiration)
hand and foot/movement of limbs/action/trick/step in a procedure (CL: 道[dao4])
